title: Pirate Royalty
description: Pirate Royalty is an open-world MMORPG built in Unreal Engine 5. Engage in epic PvP battles, team up with others for greater rewards, and forge powerful weapons to rise through the ranks. Early access launches for free in Summer 2025.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Embark on a whimsical adventure in a fractured seascape. Choose your path, join a faction, and carve your legend in this vibrant MMORPG.
<!--text-->
Welcome to the world of Pirate Royalty, where the echoes of the Sea Mother guide intrepid souls through shattered seas and mystical lands.

üåä Dive into a World of Myth and Magic
After the Maelstrom reshaped the world, factions vie for control amidst the ruins. Align with the enigmatic Deepwake Covenant, the fierce Ashcoast Raiders, the nurturing Verdant Accord, or the strategic Argent Council. Each offers unique quests, challenges, and narratives.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# ‚öîÔ∏è Choose Your Path
<!--text-->
Begin as a humble cadet in Argent City and evolve into a formidable force:

Swordsman: Master close combat and lead the charge.

Hunter: Strike from afar with unmatched precision.

Explorer: Harness coral magic to manipulate the elements.

Herbalist: Heal allies and command nature's power.

Advance to elite classes like Crusader, Sharpshooter, Voyager, or Seal Master, each unlocking new abilities and stories.

<!--image-->
![Pirate Royalty-llsxi](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/0ab81d0a4cb2416897ed00b37087a7d1/pirate-royalty-llsxi.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# üó∫ Explore Diverse Regions
<!--text-->
From the bustling streets of Argent City to the mysterious Fogbound Expanse, adventure awaits at every corner. Engage in quests that unveil the world's secrets and challenge your skills.

<!--image-->
![Pirate Royalty-1t5rm](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/0ab81d0a4cb2416897ed00b37087a7d1/pirate-royalty-1t5rm.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# ü§ù Engage in Cooperative and Competitive Play
<!--text-->
Team up with friends to tackle dungeons, or test your mettle in PvP battles. Earn honor points, craft powerful gear, and rise through the ranks in a world that rewards both strategy and bravery.

Set sail, forge alliances, and let the tides of fate shape your destiny in Pirate Royalty.

<!--image-->
![Pirate Royalty-1u788](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/0ab81d0a4cb2416897ed00b37087a7d1/pirate-royalty-1u788.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# PVP Honor System
<!--text-->
Engage in epic PvP battles within dungeons and earn honor points for your victories. These points can be exchanged for exclusive items, providing a rewarding competitive aspect for those who enjoy proving their strength in combat. The PVP Honor System adds depth to the game‚Äôs progression and gives players a reason to hone their battle skills.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Forging System
<!--text-->
Make  your weapons stronger by forging powerful gems into them. The Forging System allows you to socket gems into your gear, making your weapons stronger and adding unique abilities. Collect rare gems throughout the game and experiment with different combinations to create the ultimate weapon for your playstyle.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Forsaken City
<!--text-->
A challenging dungeon where you can engage in PvP battles while farming for valuable items and gems. The Forsaken City offers both combat and loot opportunities, making it a hot spot for players looking to level up, collect rare resources, and prove their might against other adventurers.
